title: Index

source.title: Source
source.description: The source representation to be used by the indexer to extract values

fetch.description: The source document to retrieve values from. Known variables in the URI Template are: `repo`, `ref`, `owner`, `path`

target.description: The data sink to store the extracted data in. This can be an Excel or Google spreadsheet, an Azure Index or Algolia index

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: The properties to add to the index

queries.title: Queries
queries.description: Named queries that can be executed against this index
